flask_site module¶

flask_site.adminCar()¶

Website route for getting all car information

Returns

Returns template for admin_cars.html, or redirects if wrong

flask_site.adminCarBookings()¶

Display all bookings for a car

Returns

Returns redirection to admin/car, profile or login, or tempalte for admin_car_bookings.html

flask_site.adminCarDelete()¶

Website route for deleting cars

Returns

Returns redirection to site.adminCar

flask_site.adminCarEdit()¶

Website route for editing car details

Returns

Returns template for admin_cars.txt or redirects if wrong

flask_site.adminCarIssue()¶

Website route for checking issues with cars

Returns

Returns template for admin_cars_report.html, or redirects if wrong

flask_site.adminCarIssueReport()¶

Website route for viewing report for issue

Returns

Returns template for admin_cars_report.html or redirects to admin/car

flask_site.adminUser()¶

Web page for admin account

Returns

Returns template for admin_users.html or redirects if wrong

flask_site.adminUserDelete()¶

Website route for deleting users

Returns

Redirects to site.adminUser

flask_site.adminUserEdit()¶

Website route for editing user details

Returns

Redirects to admin/user, or profile, or login

flask_site.adminUserEngineer()¶

Website route for inputting engineer data

Returns

Returns redirection to site.adminUser

flask_site.bookingConfirm()¶

Confirms booking of a car

Returns

Returns template for newbooking.html

flask_site.bookingcancel()¶

Web page for cancelling a booking

Returns

Returns template for bookingcancel.html

flask_site.engineerCarIssueUpdate()¶

Changes status of issue when engineer inputs it

Returns

Returns redirection to engineer, or profile, or login

flask_site.engineerCarlocation()¶

Displays car location on google maps, with directions from homebase

Returns

Returns template to engineer_location.html, or redirects

flask_site.engineerJobs()¶

Lists all jobs for a specific engineer

Returns

Returns template for engineer_jobs.html, or redirects

flask_site.getCarIDToSearch()¶

Gets carID for searching using the voice recognition

Returns

Returns found CarID (whatever was said to the microphone)

Return type

String

flask_site.home()¶

Web page for a logged in user

Returns

Returns the template of home.html, or redirects to login if not logged in

flask_site.index()¶

Main page of website, redirects to login

Returns

login redirection

flask_site.login()¶

Web page for logging in

Returns

Returns the template of login.html

flask_site.logout()¶

Method to log out

Returns

Redirects to login

flask_site.newbooking()¶

Web page for making a booking for a car

Returns

Returns template for newbooking.html

flask_site.newcar()¶

Method on site for creating a new car

Returns

Returns template for newcar.html

flask_site.profile()¶

Web page for the profile of a user

Returns

Returns the template of profile.html, or redirects to login if not logged in

flask_site.pushbullet(title, body, key, assigned_to)¶

Uses pushbullet API to notify engineer using the pushbullet app when an admin logs an issue with a car

Parameters

  • title (String) – Title of the issue

  • body (String) – Body of the message

  • key (String) – API Key

  • assigned_to (String) – Assigned Engineer

flask_site.recognize_speech_from_mic(recognizer, microphone)¶
flask_site.register()¶

Web page for registering an account

Returns

Returns the template of register.html

flask_site.searchcar()¶

Web page for searching a car

Returns

Returns template for search.html

flask_site.test()¶
